::: {.callout-info title="Encountered a Problem or Have a Suggestion?"}
We encourage authors and visitors to share any technical issues, correction requests, or improvement suggestions related to the *Journal of Sustainable Technology in Agriculture (JOSTA)*.
:::

## 📩 Report a problem via GitHub {.unnumbered}

All issues submitted through GitHub will be publicly visible. Once an issue is resolved, it will be marked as *closed* on the GitHub tracker. This helps us maintain transparency and traceability in handling concerns.

To file an issue, click the button below:

::: {style="margin: 1em 0;"}
<a href="https://github.com/STATOBERRYPAPAYA/JOSTAPUBS/issues/new" class="btn btn-outline-danger"> <i class="bi bi-exclamation-triangle-fill"></i> Report a Problem </a>
:::

## ✍️ What to Include {.unnumbered}

When submitting, please try to provide:

-   Clear and concise description of the issue
-   Title of article (if applicable)
-   Screenshots (optional)
-   Your name and email (optional, for follow-up)

> 🧾 You will need a GitHub account to submit. If you don’t have one, [create a free account here](https://github.com/join).

## 🔐 Private or Confidential Matters? {.unnumbered}

If your concern is **sensitive or private**, please do not use the public GitHub issue tracker. Instead, email us directly at:

📧 [**jostapubs\@gmail.com**](mailto:jostapubs@gmail.com)

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you for helping us improve JOSTA. Your feedback supports our mission of transparent and accessible academic publishing
